narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Faith and Hope Ind. is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Monroe, LA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.9M in Medicaid payments across 95K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
